level.heading: Effect of registration in beneficiary form.
level.text: The designation of a TOD beneficiary on a registration in beneficiary form has no effect on ownership until the owner's death. A registration of a security in beneficiary form may be canceled or changed at any time by the sole owner or all then surviving owners without the consent of the beneficiary.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-292
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-292, see notes following § 19-601.01.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 306 of the Uniform Nonprobate Transfers on Death Act (1991 Act).
